Translations.Text: Ara smarana karuna e kitabe mara'iyamake, yakhana se tara paribarabarga theke prthaka haye niralaya purba dike eka sthane asraya nila
atahpara se tadera nikata theke nijeke arala karala. Takhana amara tara kache amadera ruhake pathalama, se tara nikata purna manabakrtite atmaprakasa karala
Mara'iyama balala, ami tomara theke dayamayera asraya prarthana karachi (allahke bhaya kara) yadi tumi ‘muttaki’ ha'o
Se balala, ami to tomara rabera duta, tomake eka pabitra putra dana karara jan'ya
Mara'iyama balala, ‘kemana kare amara putra habe yakhana amake kono purusa sparsa kareni ebam ami byabhicarini'o na'i?’

Se balala, ‘e rupa'i habe. Tomara raba balechena, ‘eta amara jan'ya sahaja. Ara amara take ejan'ye srsti karaba yena se haya manusera jan'ya eka nidarsana [1] o amadera kacha theke eka anugraha; eta to eka sthirikrta byapara.’
Atahpara se take garbhe dharana karala ebam ta saha durera eka sthane cale gela
Atahpara prasaba-bedana take eka khejura-gachera nice asraya nite badhya karala. Se balala, ‘haya, era age yadi ami mare yetama [1] ebam manusera smrti theke sampurna hariye yetama
Takhana phirisata tara nica theke deke take balala, ‘tumi peresana hayo na [1], tomara padadese tomara raba eka nahara srsti karechena
‘ara tumi tomara dike khejura-gachera kande nara da'o, seta tomara upara taja-paka khejura phelabe

‘Kaje'i kha'o, pana kara ebam cokha jura'o. Atahpara manusera madhye ka'uke'o yadi tumi dekha takhana balo, ami dayamayera uddese maunata abalambanera manata karechi [1]. Kaje'i aja ami kichute'i kono manusera sathe kathabarta balabo na
tarapara se santanake niye tara sampradayera kache upasthita hala; tara balala, ‘he mara'iyama! Tumi to eka aghatana kare basecha
‘He harunera bona! [1] Tomara pita asat byakti chila na ebam tomara ma'o chila na byabhicarini
Takhana mara'iyama santanera prati ingita karala. Tara balala, ‘ye kalera sisu tara sathe amara kemana kare katha balaba?’
Tini balalena, ‘ami to allahara banda. Tini amake kitaba diyechena, amake nabi karechena
‘yekhane'i ami thaki na kena tini amake barakatamaya [1] karechena, tini amake nirdesa diyechena yatadina jibita thaki tatadina salata o yakata adaya karate
‘ara amake amara mayera prati anugata karechena ebam tini amake karenani ud'dhata, hatabhagya
‘Amara prati santi yedina ami janma labha karechi [1], yedina amara mrtyu habe ebam yedina jibita abasthaya ami ut'thita haba
E-i mara'iyamera putra isa. Ami balalama satya katha, ye bisaye tara sandeha posana karache
Allah emana nana ye, kono santana grahana karabena, tini pabitra mahimamaya. Tini yakhana kichu sthira karena, takhana setara jan'ya balena, ‘ha'o’ tate'i ta haye yaya
Ara niscaya'i allah amara raba o tomadera raba; kaje'i tomara tamra ibadata kara, eta'i sarala patha
Atahpara dalagulo nijedera madhye matanaikya srsti karala [1], kaje'i durbhoga kapheradera jan'ya mahadibasa pratyaksakale
Tara yedina amadera kache asabe sedina tara kata camatkara sunabe o dekhabe [1]! Kintu yalemara aja spasta bibhrantite ache.’
Ara taderake satarka kare dina paritapera dina [1] sambandhe, yakhana saba sid'dhanta haye yabe. Athaca tara rayeche gaphalatite nimajjita ebam tara imana anache na
Niscaya yamina o tara upara yara ache tadera curanta malikana amadera'i ra'ibe ebam amadera'i kache tara pratyabartita habe
